name: Motorcycle Rider - Highway
description:
Like free motorbike games or see yourself as a motorcycle rider?

Recreates the excitement of long boring rides!

Ride your way across an endless wintery landscape.

This 3D motorbike driving game allows you to drive the motorcycle through the day and night before you run out of gas. Watch the sun set on the horizon as you power your bike along the long and winding road.

Motorcycle Rider has:
* rider view camera 
* touch screen steering
 * traffic lorry and buses to avoid 
* realistic physics
